articles.content:
Just Cause of Korean People Supported 
    Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- L. Chandramun, president of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Mauritius, on June 6 when he met Pak Kun Gwang, DPRK ambassador to Mauritius, stated that his party would invariably support the Korean people's cause of reunification and their just struggle to defend the sovereignty and peace of the country.
 Saying he could not forget the day when he was received by President Kim Il Sung while visiting the DPRK, he said he was greatly encouraged by the Korean people's struggle to defend socialism and build a great prosperous powerful nation.

articles.content:
Congratulations to Togolese Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju sent a congratulatory message to Edem Kodjo upon his appointment as prime minister of Togo.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop favorably, the message sincerely wished him great success in his new job for national unity and economic development.
